headline: Volunteer validator set funds refugee broadband through ETH tips
article: Grassroots node operators in Eastern Europe pooled their staking rewards to sponsor community broadband links that keep displaced students online. The group open-sourced its budgeting sheets so other DAOs can copy the playbook.

headline: Solar-powered miners throttle hash rate to stabilize island grid
article: A civic energy co-op in the Pacific published telemetry proving that dynamically curbing GPU miners during peak load helped the local grid avoid brownouts while still funding battery expansion.

headline: Indie researchers publish open OHLCV audit trail for BASE meme pairs
article: Three independent quants collected and anonymized an OHLCV dataset for new BASE pairs that lacked transparent price history. They released the files under a Creative Commons license so small funds can benchmark risk models.
